data.title: Python for Beginners
data.description: Learn Python programming from scratch. This course covers fundamentals, data structures, functions, and object-oriented programming.

modules.title: Getting Started with Python
modules.description: Introduction to Python and setting up your development environment

lessons.title: Introduction to Python
lessons.content:
# Introduction to Python

Python is a versatile, beginner-friendly programming language known for its clean syntax and readability.

## Why Learn Python?
- Easy to learn
- Large community
- Versatile applications

lessons.title: Installing Python
lessons.content:
# Installing Python

Follow these steps to install Python on your computer:

1. Visit python.org
2. Download the latest version
3. Run the installer
4. Verify installation with `python --version`

lessons.title: Your First Python Program
lessons.content:
# Hello World

```python
print('Hello, World!')
```

Congratulations! You've written your first Python program.

modules.title: Variables and Data Types
modules.description: Understanding variables, strings, numbers, and basic data types

lessons.title: Variables in Python
lessons.content:
# Variables in Python

Variables are containers for storing data values.

```python
name = 'John'
age = 25
height = 5.9
```

lessons.title: Numbers and Strings
lessons.content:
# Numbers and Strings

## Numbers
```python
age = 25
price = 19.99
```

## Strings
```python
name = 'John'
message = "Hello World"
```

lessons.title: Quiz: Variables
lessons.content:
# Quiz: Variables

1. What is a variable?
2. Which is a valid variable name?

modules.title: Control Flow
modules.description: If statements, loops, and program flow control

lessons.title: If Statements
lessons.content:
# If Statements

```python
age = 18
if age >= 18:
    print('Adult')
else:
    print('Minor')
```

lessons.title: Loops
lessons.content:
# Loops in Python

## For Loop
```python
for i in range(5):
    print(i)
```

## While Loop
```python
while count < 5:
    count += 1
```

data.title: Web Development with React
data.description: Build modern web applications with React. Learn components, hooks, state management, and best practices.

lessons.title: What is React?
lessons.content:
# What is React?

React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces, developed by Facebook.

lessons.title: Components
Props and State
lessons.content:
# Props and State

Props are read-only inputs to components. State is mutable data managed within a component.

modules.title: React Hooks
modules.description: React Hooks for state and effects

lessons.title: useState Hook
lessons.content:
# useState Hook

```jsx
const [count, setCount] = useState(0);
```

lessons.title: useEffect Hook

data.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
data.description: Start your journey into machine learning. Learn algorithms, model training, and practical applications.

lessons.title: What is Machine Learning?
lessons.content:
# What is Machine Learning?

Machine Learning is a subset of AI that enables systems to learn from data.

lessons.title: Types of ML
lessons.content:
# Types of Machine Learning

1. **Supervised Learning** - Learning from labeled data
2. **Unsupervised Learning** - Finding patterns in unlabeled data
3. **Reinforcement Learning** - Learning through rewards

lessons.title: ML Tools and Libraries
lessons.content:
# ML Tools

- Scikit-learn
- TensorFlow
- PyTorch
- Pandas & NumPy

lessons.title: Linear Regression
lessons.content:
# Linear Regression

Predicting continuous values using linear relationships.

lessons.title: Classification
lessons.content:
# Classification

Predicting discrete categories from input features.

data.title: SQL Database Fundamentals
data.description: Master SQL queries and database management. Learn to create, read, update, and delete data effectively.

modules.title: SQL Basics
modules.description: Introduction to SQL and basic queries

lessons.title: Introduction to Databases
lessons.content:
# Introduction to Databases

Databases store organized collections of data that can be easily accessed and managed.
